extDescription.description: The description of the extension. HD is short for High Definition.
extDescription.message: Assista aos vídeos do Youtube automaticamente em HD.

extName.description: The name of the extension. Please translate it to whatever is most similar to 'Auto HD'. HD is short for High Definition.

extSettings.description: When you translate 'Auto HD', please ensure that it is translated the same as in the extension name (above). HD is short for High Definition.

playQuality.description: The headline of a setting which allows the user to choose the default quality of their YouTube player

playerSize.description: The headline of a setting which allows the user to choose the default size of their YouTube player

rateUs.description: The label on a button that encourages users to rate the app

reportBug.description: The label on a button that lets users report a problem
